definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: The storm is under the influence of STR.
sentences.chinese: 風暴正受副熱帶高壓脊的影響。

sentences.english: The NW edge of the subtropical ridge retreated a bit last night.
sentences.chinese: 影響浣熊的副熱帶高壓脊西北沿於昨晚稍稍東退。

sentences.english: A dynamical model is developed to simulate the variation of subtropical high ridge-line section (SHRS).
sentences.chinese: 發展了一個描述副熱帶高壓脊面變化的動力模型。

sentences.english: SARIKA will move NNE in the northwestern periphery of the subtropical ridge.
sentences.chinese: 莎莉嘉將沿副熱帶高壓脊西北面向東北偏北移動。

sentences.english: HALONG will move NE along the NW periphery of the subtropical ridge in the rest of the forecast period.
sentences.chinese: 夏浪將於餘下時間沿副熱帶高壓脊西北部向東北移動。

sentences.english: PEIPAH is now predominantly steered by the subtropical ridge ENE of it , inducing a weak NW movement.
sentences.chinese: 琵琶正沿副熱帶高壓脊的西南部向西北方向移動。

sentences.english: It is expected that WIPHA will travel northwards along the western periphery of the steering subtropical ridge.
sentences.chinese: 韋帕將在餘下時間沿副熱帶高壓脊之西部向北移動。

sentences.english: PEIPAH is now predominantly steered by the subtropical ridge ENE of it , inducing a WNW movement.
sentences.chinese: 琵琶正沿副熱帶高壓脊的西南部向西北偏西方向移動。

sentences.english: LUPIT will move NE in the northwestern periphery of the subtropical ridge.
sentences.chinese: 盧碧將沿副熱帶高壓脊向東北移動。

sentences.english: NAKRI will traverse the ridge axis of the steering subtropical ridge and recurve.
sentences.chinese: 娜基莉將橫過副熱帶高壓脊的脊線向北後轉東北移動。

sentences.english: The winter in Nanyue is colder while the subtropical high is stronger, and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 西太平洋副熱帶高壓與南嶽冬季氣溫密切相關。
